en.title_about: My history and my knowledge in leatherwork and macrame
en.title_custom: Custom Creation of leatherwork and macrame - Personalize your accessories
en.description_custom: Welcome in the space Creation Sur Mesure.
en.text_nomad_creation: Each custom creation is inspired by traditional techniques and cultural influences encountered during my travels across Europe. My approach combines originality and passion to offer unique pieces, imbued with history.
en.title_creation_step: Your custom creation, step by step
en.text_creation_step: You want a leather accessory or a macrame decoration entirely personalized? Here is how we create together a unique piece:
en.list_creation_step1: 1. Initial exchange : Contact me by email or phone to discuss your project and get an initial estimate.
en.list_creation_step2: 2. Design : Realization of a detailed sketch and establishment of a precise quote.
en.list_creation_step3: 3. Start of production : A 1/3 of the price is requested to start the production.
en.list_creation_step4: 4. Validation : I send you visuals to finalize the motifs and adjust the details if necessary.
en.list_creation_step5: 5. Delivery : Once the final payment is received, your creation is carefully packaged and shipped with insurance for a safe delivery
en.list_why_choose_my_creations_1: 100% handmade production with carefully selected materials during my travels.
en.list_why_choose_my_creations_2: An enriched know-how through exchanges with creators and European specialists.
en.list_why_choose_my_creations_3: Each of my creations carries the mark of the journey and the culture that inspired it.
en.list_why_choose_my_creations_4: Personalized creations, made with passion and attention to detail.
en.text_contact: A project, an idea, a desire to exchange on my creations or on the nomadic life ? Write me !
